properties.Observatio: Located in the Kirimetiya reserve. There is a collecting pit built of concrete (L=0.75m, W=0.75m, H=0.9m). Water is leaking from the catchpit and the boundaries are not marked. There are no boundaries.
properties.Descriptio: Construction of curtain wall (0.075mm thk) with 1:2:4 (3/4") concrete, 1/2" dowels at 600mm x 600mm intervals and embedded with chicken mesh/12.5mm thick rough ct.plaster in 1:3 cement sand mortar semi rough finish(UR55)/Fabricating & fixing security wel

properties.Observatio: Located in the Punchikele reserve. There is a tank built of concrete (Dia.6m, H=6.5m). A formal water scheme is in place.
properties.Descriptio: Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Miscellaneous/CONTINGANCIES

properties.Observatio: A well has been constructed using RRM and the top of the well is covered with a concrete slab. (L=2.4m, W=2.1m, H=1.2m).  The boundaries are not marked.
properties.Descriptio: Located in the Pupuressa estate. There is a collecting pit built of concrete (L=1.5m, W=1.2m, H=0.9m). There are no boundaries.

properties.Observatio: Located in the Pupuressa estate. There is a collecting pit built of concrete (L=1.5m, W=1.2m, H=0.9m). There are no boundaries.

properties.Observatio: A dam and catchpit is built across a flowing water stream to collect water(L=1.0m, W=1.0m, H=0.6m). A formal water scheme has been established. The boundaries are not marked.

properties.Observatio: A dam has been built to collect water and a stock tank has been constructed to store that water. There are no boundaries. [Stock tank Location - N 7.108793, E 80.695004]
properties.Descriptio: Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Miscellaneous/CONTINGANCIES

properties.Observatio: This is a spring-fed stream, and many people use water from this canal.
properties.Descriptio: Vegetative cover improving for narrow strips (1.5m-2.0m wide) with Arecanut seedlings at 1.5m spacing in 2 rows, Betel plants VP at 3m spacing in 1 row, Green gram as a cover crop/Miscellaneous/CONTINGANCIES 10%

properties.Observatio: There is big trees and it borders privet lands.  Land is being illegally acquired because there are no boundaries.

properties.Observatio: Although part of this area has fairly large trees, the rest is pines trees have been planted. The villagers say that water is gradually becoming scarce due to this cultivation. Land is being illegally acquired because there are no boundaries.
